text: A new year means new shows and films to stream on all your favorite services. Netflix will start the new year off right with one of the world ’ s favorite superheroes, bringing in five Batman films including Tim Burton ’ s “ Batman ” and Christopher Nolan ’ s “ Batman Begins. ” In addition, all three “ Godfather ” films, the four “ Lethal Weapon ” movies, and the five entries in the “ Bring It On ” series will be on Netflix, allowing viewers to ring in the new year with a movie marathon. Other notable titles coming to Netflix in January are the always meme - y “ National Treasure, ” the classic “ Breakfast at Tiffany ’ s, ” and Jack Black ’ s new biopic about Jan Lewan ’ s polka Ponzi scheme “ The Polka King. ”
